modals.welcome_to_report: Bug reports, feature requests and improvements are all welcome.
modals.feedback_page: We host a feedback page on
modals.change_nomination: Once submitted, your nominations will be removed from your dashboard immediately, and will not be nominated from the start of the next era.
modals.read_only: Your account is read only, and cannot sign transactions.
modals.no_rewards: You have no rewards to claim.
modals.claim_reward2: Withdrawing rewards will immediately transfer them to your account as free balance.
modals.claim_reward1: Once submitted, your rewards will be bonded back into the pool.You own these additional bonded funds and will be able to withdraw them at any time.
modals.not_authenticated: Not Authenticated. Authenticate and Try Again
modals.lock_pool_result: Once you Lock the pool no one else can join the pool
modals.unlock_pool_result: Once you Unlock the pool new people can join the pool
modals.destroy_pool_result: Once you Destroy the pool, all members can be permissionlessly unbonded, and the pool can never be reopened.
modals.stored_on_chain: Your updated name will be stored on-chain as encoded bytes. The update will take effect immediately.
modals.being_destroyed: This pool is being destroyed. There are no management options available.
modals.stop_joining_pool: Stop new members from joining the pool.
modals.allow_to_join: Allow new members to join the pool.
modals.update_name: Update the public name of the pool.
modals.brave_text: To Brave users! Due to a recent update (Brave version 1.36), there may appear issues while using light clients (e.g. not connected).
modals.must_have_controller: You must have your controller account imported to start nominating
modals.not_meet_minimum: You do not meet the minimum nominator bond of {{minNominatorBondBase}} {{unit}}. Please bond some funds before nominating.
modals.once_submitted: Once submitted, you will start nominating your chosen validators.
modals.will_surpass: Adding this many favorites will surpass {{maxNominations}} nominations.
modals.no_nominator_role: You do not have a nominator role in any pools.
modals.once_unbonding: Once unbonding, your funds to become available after {{bondDuration}} eras.
modals.no_free_to_bond: You have no free {{unit}} to bond.
modals.bonding_withdraw: Bonding will also withdraw your outstanding rewards of
modals.added_to_bond: This amount of {{unit}} will be added to your current bonded funds.
modals.unbonding_withdraw: Unbonding will also withdraw your outstanding rewards of
modals.controller_imported: You must have your controller account imported to unbond.
modals.stop_nominating_before: Stop nominating before unbonding all funds.
modals.update_bond4: Once unbonding, you must wait {{bondDuration}} eras for your funds to become available.
modals.unbound_to_minimum: Unbond up to the {{minCreateBondBase}} {{unit}} minimum bond for pool depositors.
modals.unbound_to_maintain: Unbond up to the {{minJoinBondBase}} {{unit}} minimum to maintain your pool membership
modals.must_have_controller_update: You must have your controller account imported to update your reward destination
modals.unlock_take: Unlocks take {{bondDuration}} eras before they can be withdrawn.
modals.rebond_unlock: You can rebond unlocks at any time in this period, or withdraw them to your free balance thereafter.
modals.unlock_chunk: Unlock chunks cannot currently be rebonded in a pool. If you wish to rebond, withdraw the unlock chunk first and the add to your bond.
modals.you_must_controller: You must have your controller account imported to stop nominating.
modals.you_must_account: You must have your account imported to stop nominating.
